Tempest Burst.name: Tempest Burst
Tempest Burst.flavor: You flood your surroundings with the force, fire, lightning, acid or cold that manifests within you.
keywords: Acid, Cold, Fire, Force or Lightning
Tempest Burst.attack: Strength +5 vs. Reflex, Dexterity  +5 vs. Reflex, or Constitution  +5 vs. Reflex
Tempest Burst.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier acid, cold, fire, force, or lightning damage.
Tempest Burst.special: See the Elemental Attacks path feature for determining the type of damage this power deals. This power has the appropriate keyword or keywords for the manifestation or manifestations you are using.

Absorb Elements.name: Absorb Elements
Absorb Elements.flavor: An enemy assails you with elemental power, and you absorb it and use it to strengthen your own attacks.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: Your resistance to fire, lightning, or cold damage prevents damage to you.  Effect: Once before the end of the encounter, you can deal damage of the same type (of one of those three types) equal to your resistance value. You must choose to gain this bonus to damage after the result of the attack roll is known, but before  damage is dealt.
